scripts.package: electron-packager ./ SuperTools --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=icon/icon.ico && xcopy config.ini release-builds\SuperTools-win32-x64\resources\ /Y && xcopy bin release-builds\SuperTools-win32-x64\resources /E /Y && cd release-builds\SuperTools-win32-x64\resources && ..\..\..\bin\7z a  ..\..\update.7z app.asar && cd ..\..\..\ && echo 'scp release-builds/update.7z root@192.168.16.12:/home/update/update.'
scripts.packagelinux: rm release-builds/update.7z db/* -f && electron-packager ./ SuperTools --platform=linux --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=icon/icon.ico && cd release-builds/SuperTools-linux-x64/resources/ && 7z a update.7z ./app.asar && mv update.7z ../../ && cd ../../..  && echo 'scp release-builds/update.7z root@192.168.16.12:/home/update/update.'
